title: How to Make Baileys Irish Cream

steps.headline: Measure and pour all of the ingredients into a blender.
steps.description: You can also add one additional teaspoon of coffee granules and vanilla extract for taste.

steps.headline: Blend everything together for 30 seconds on a high speed.
steps.description: Make sure that the mixture is smooth in texture.

steps.headline: Store the cream in a well sealed bottle.
Place the bottle in the refrigerator and let it chill.
Enjoy Baileys by itself, as an ingredient to a drink, or "over the rocks" (over ice).

text: Assemble the ingredients.  Measure and pour all of the ingredients into a blender. You can also add one additional teaspoon of coffee granules and vanilla extract for taste. Blend everything together for 30 seconds on a high speed. Make sure that the mixture is smooth in texture. Store the cream in a well sealed bottle.  Place the bottle in the refrigerator and let it chill.  Enjoy Baileys by itself, as an ingredient to a drink, or "over the rocks" (over ice).
sentences: Measure and pour all of the ingredients into a blender.
You can also add one additional teaspoon of coffee granules and vanilla extract for taste.
Blend everything together for 30 seconds on a high speed.
Make sure that the mixture is smooth in texture.
Store the cream in a well sealed bottle.
Place the bottle in the refrigerator and let it chill.
Enjoy Baileys by itself, as an ingredient to a drink, or "over the rocks" (over ice).
